content: https://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man3/backtrace.3.html - Based on the information available here, I am trying to call the libc::backtrace_symbols_fd function but the compiler says, that the function is not available. Does libc does not contain this function? If it is not present in libc, is there any other way to call this function?
It can be declared using extern "C" { fn backtrace ... } block. The function itself is non-standard, and available only in glibc, though.
